comments: Dan was awesome. Definitely buy the workbook bc he based all of his hw assignments from it & you have to answer the books questions but didn\'t use the grammar one much, he tells you to reference it at times in class & if you don\'t have it no big deal bc its "for your use". Go to class bc you only have 2 free absences before it starts to count.

Awesome teacher--he was very helpful and took the time to explain what he was looking for in his assignments. He may have treated students like children b/c they acted like it....I thought he was great.
Good teacher, he was helpful if you needed it, but we moved quick enough so as not to make anyone bored. Recommended.
i enjoy his class and learned a lot from him
He is a good guy. People may feel they are treated like children. That could be that they act like children and must be treated that way. COME TO CLASS PEOPLE.
This professor treats us as if we were children and not adults. He is a very hard grader and does not take into consideration your opinions.

He also teaches H.S students which means he brings some of his teachings from there. By that, I mean he treats everyone like a child and also has everyone read they\'re essays in front of the class. I never understood why.
